summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate the functionality of a group component, covering entity ID expansion, visibility toggling, state aggregation, initialization behavior, handling of nested and duplicate groups, domain filtering, and dynamic updates such as device tracker zone changes.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the group component by automatically testing its core behaviors, preventing regressions, and ensuring that group state reflects member entities accurately under various configurations and runtime scenarios.
